name: Copper Forge
pages: The Copper forge is 1.14x more faster than the vanilla furnace, with 2 additional smelting slots, below is the recipe for it. This forge can use any of these $(l:upgrades)upgrades/$, and requires the $(l:patchouli:furnaces/copper_furnace)copper furnace/$ to craft. Additionally it requires 1 $(l:patchouli:items/iron_conductor_block)iron conductor block/$ in its recipe
